item.description:
We'll be reading "Waiting" by Chinese/American author Ha Jin which won the National Book Award in 1999. Set in China, it's the story of a doctor trying to free himself from an arranged marriage. Fred will facilitate the discussion.

Zadie Smith's On Beauty is over 400 pages and we are trying to keep books
to 350 or fewer pages so that people have enough time to finish a book
and work :).
item.name: Reading books by international writers April Meetup
